title: MS AccessTrim()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MS AccessTrim()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Remove leading and trailing spaces from a string:
SELECT Trim("    SQL Tutorial    ") AS TrimmedString;

Definition and Usage
The Trim() function removes both leading and trailing spaces from a string.
Syntax
Trim(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to strip both leading and trailing spaces from
Technical Details
Works in:
From Access 2000

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MS AccessTrim()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MS AccessTrim()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MS AccessTrim()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
